AI Description: R6 is an object-oriented programming system in R that allows for the creation of reference classes. It provides a way to define classes with reference semantics, similar to traditional object-oriented programming languages such as Java or C++. Reference classes allow for mutable objects and methods that can modify object state.
Core Features: Creation Of Reference Classes In R, Implementation Of Classical Object-Oriented Programming Concepts, Support For Mutable Objects, Methods That Can Modify Object State
General Tags: Programming, Object-Oriented Programming, Reference Classes, R Language
